title: "Self-Driving Pods Being Tested at Atlanta International"
excerpt: "Robotic people-moving pods were recently tested at Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport. The autonomous electric vehicles are designed to transport people in need of assistance in crowded places like airports and malls."
